name: postmark
description: Ridiculously Simple Email Sending From Node.js For http://www.postmarkapp.com

scripts.compile-docs: echo 'Generating docs.' && mkdir -p ./docs && rm -r ./docs && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc -c jsdoc.conf.json -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -d docs ./lib/postmark/*.js && git add -A ./docs && echo 'generated docs.'
